guides.title: Create A Group
guides.description: To create a group, navigate to "Track It", press the button on the top-right, and click "Add Group".

guides.title: Create A Card In A Group
guides.description:
To add a card to a group, navigate to "Track It", enter your group, press the button on the top-right, and click "Add Card".

You can also press "Edit Cards" and enter the card list editor, where you can press "Create a new card" to add a new card.

guides.title: Edit, Share, Delete Groups And Edit Cards
guides.description: To access the group options, hold the group card and select your desired action.

guides.title: Edit A Card In A Group
guides.description:
To edit a card in a group, navigate to "Track It", enter your group, press the button on the top-right, and click "Edit Cards".

You are now in the card list editor, tap an entry to edit it, drag it to change the order it appears in the tracking screen, or swipe it to the left to delete it.

guides.title: Share Or Export A Group
guides.description: To share or export a group, navigate to "Track It", hold your group, and click "Share Group".

guides.title: Import A Group
guides.description:
To import a group, navigate to "Track It", press the button on the top-right, and click "Import Group".

Find the file you want to import from the document browser and click it.
